titleStmt.title: Markes and no markes, of the Kingdome of Heauen: or, A treatise of things neccessary, vnnecessary, to the Kingdome of God. By Henry Greenewood Master of Art, and preacher of the word of God
titleStmt.author: Greenwood, Henry, b. 1544 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Eliz. All-de, and are to bee sold by Michael Sparke dvvelling at the blue Bible in Greene-Arbour,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
